title: Barbie (Blu-Ray + Digital)
descriptions:
Step into the dazzling, hilarious, and heartfelt world of Barbie Land with Barbie (Blu-Ray + Digital)! This collector-ready edition lets you experience the smash-hit film in stunning HD at home, plus enjoy the convenience of a Digital copy you can watch anytime, anywhere. Perfect for first-time viewers and superfans alike, it’s a candy-colored adventure that’s as smart and self-aware as it is irresistibly fun.

Why you’ll love it:
- A perfect escape to Barbie Land: Immerse yourself in a vibrant, meticulously crafted world where every day is fabulous—unless you’re having an existential crisis… or you’re Ken.
- Blu-Ray + Digital: Own the best of both worlds with pristine Blu-Ray visuals and a Digital copy for on-the-go viewing across your favorite devices.
- Laugh-out-loud meets feel-all-the-feels: A witty, modern tale that balances big laughs with big ideas about identity, purpose, and being unapologetically you.

Exclusive bonus content you won’t want to miss:
- It’s a Weird World: Dive into the delightfully unexpected corners of Barbie Land.
- All-Star Barbie Party: Celebrate with the sensational cast behind the magic.
- Musical Make-Believe: Go behind the scenes of the film’s show-stopping musical moments.
- Becoming Barbie: Explore the transformation into the world’s most iconic doll.
- Welcome to Barbie Land: A guided tour of the film’s whimsical, lavish sets.
- Playing Dress-Up: An extended look at the costumes of Barbie, from dream-house chic to runway-ready.

Whether you’re here for the fashion, the music, the laughs, or the surprisingly profound journey, Barbie (Blu-Ray + Digital) is your passport to pure joy. Add it to your collection and relive the wonder of Barbie Land anytime you like.
